Finally, after what felt like a never-ending train journey, you've arrived in your new town. You don't quite remember why you moved here, but it must've been for a good reason, right?

Leaving little time to unpack your belongings in your new home, you step outside and start to explore around town. But where should you go first...?
1.title: You've arrived!

GIANT Ankha, looking down at you with disgust and contempt
1111.content:
Of all the houses that were close by, this one happened to be the most eye-catching.

At a first glance it didn't differ too much from other buildings around here: a cube with a spiky roof, to put it a simply as possible. Oh, but what a roof it was, stylized to look like a miniature, golden pyramid. It looked so real, as if it was shrunk and nabbed straight outta Egypt.
The house itself was built out of a gray brick, which looked much blander when contrasted with the roof. Its owner must've thought the same, though, as each brick was decorated with colorful hieroglyphs. Sadly, you couldn't tell if there was any meaning hidden in those, or if they were just randomly painted on.

In your youth you used to be a real sucker for anything Ancient Egypt related, even dreaming of becoming at some point an Egyptologist. Those fantasies are well past you now, but the interest in that place lingered in the back of your mind to this very day. It seemed that whoever owned that house was also a big of it. Perhaps meeting them could spark that old interest anew.

You approached your neighbor's doors, which seemed to be the most ordinary-looking piece of the house. Just a regular, wooden door with an Egyptian ankh engraved around its peephole. Without thinking much about it, you gently knocked at the door... Only to immediately regret it.

All of a sudden, your head started hurting. Badly. The worlds started spinning, your vision got blurry. Unable to keep yourself standing, you fell at the intriguing house's doorsteps, only managing to get a glimpse of its owner's feet before finally falling unconscious.

A pair of yellow paws...

---

The first thing that you saw upon regaining you consciousness was...
1111.title: Ankha

choices: Ankha rises her foot above you
Ankha stuffs you in-between two of her toes
Ankha calls for another snooty villager to aid her
11113.content:
Words could hardly describe the improbability of the being that stood before you.

She was an absolute giant of a catgirl, her height comparable to that of a freaking lighthouse. Her body mostly resembled that of a human, though with some key differences, such the her pointy ears, long tail, feral muzzle, and body covered in golden and navy blue striped fur. Her hands and feet only had four digits each, all of them tipped with white claw, and padded with black pawpads. Her hair was blue, cut in a way that immediately brought to mind Cleopatra. The giantess was wearing a white dress, with patterns that made it resemble a mummy's wrappings, and a golden diadem with a cobra-shaped ornament at its front. She wore a deep black makeup around her eyes, which... Were looking down... Straight at you...

oh

While you were busy studying the giantess from head to toe, the catgirl kept her own two eyes locked on you. The disgusted look she was giving you sent shivers down your spine. Impressed with you she was not, that much was for certain, while you couldn't help but gawk at her quite honestly gorgeous form. You could easily see yourself falling for her looks alone... Were you not an inch or so tall, and seemingly at her mercy.

"You certainly took your sweet time, speck." the giant catgirl finally spoke, though just like her gaze it ended up filling you with more fear of the giantess. Hell, they way she said it, she almost spat that last word out. The contempt she had for your meager self couldn't be any more apparent.

"M-my time?" You called out to her, somehow able to speak despite all the madness going on right now. For a moment you were worried that she wouldn't be able to hear you, but seeing how her ears perked up at the sound of your voice, you figured she must've caught that. If only you caught the look she gave you when you spoke...

"M-miss, I'm s-sorry if I offended you in some way, b-bu-"

"Silence!" She almost shouted, stomping one of her feet close by for emphasis. Just seeing that giant appendage move so quickly, the massive things so effortlessly rising and falling to the ground, it honestly made you feel ill. How could something so big move so quickly!? How was she real!?!? How was any of this real!?!?

"The wretch dares speak to me without my permission. Haa, how typical, fresh maggots like you are always unruly like that."

Heh, ironic. It seemed that neither of you could stand to look at the other.
You wanted to ask her what she meant by that, but the words got stuck in your throat the moment her other foot rose high up, moving in to join the first one at your other side. Now the giant catgirl was basically right above you, with both of her giant feet uncomfortably close to your small form. You could've sworn that things got a bit hot with those two paws nearby... and a bit smelly too.

"It is crucial that I grind some good manners into your pathetic ilk as soon as possible, least you end up annoying me too quickly, and get squashed too soon to be any of any use to me. Let's see how easily you can be..."

oh no

"Fixed"
11113.title: Giantess Ankha

111133.content:
"Now then" Ankha announced loudly "While I would nothing more than to get some alone time with you, it just so happened that your intrusion correlated with a small tea party I was having. Moreover, the topic of our chat also happened to be centered around little maggots like yourself, and how to properly train them."

As she was saying it, Ankha was smiling from ear to ear. Whenever she paused her speech, she would flash you a toothy grin, filling you even more with dread. She oh so enjoyed the prospect of owning you, it was a terrifying thing to behold, and consider. The things she could do to you...

"It would be soooo~ undignified of me to leave my friend out of it. especially when she mentioned, how lovely it would be if we could share some of our... techniques with one another."

No, you couldn't take this talk anymore. As mad as it was to try, you had to do something. You couldn't spend a second more with her, or under her, or whatever! Enough was enough!
As quickly as you could manage it, your rose to your feet, and took off in a mad dash, running in a direction opposite of hers, towards what you assumed to be the front door. Noticing a small gap between it and the floor, you concluded that it should be enough for you to fit through, provided you could even make it.
Surprisingly, you didn't hear any sound coming from behind you, as if the giant catgirl wasn't even going after you. You'd look back, but you were trying to remain focused on your goal. So close it was now, only a couple more seconds, and-

"You can come in now~"

In a flash, all fell to ruin. The giant doors opened, revealing to you two things:
1) they didn't lead outside, but into another room,
2) there was someone behind, ready to put block your path.

You couldn't get a good look at them, before they took a swift step forward, putting one of their giant feet down right in your way. The power of their stomp put an end to your escape attempt, your body sent flying from the shockwave it caused. Now lying down on you back, head spinning, you couldn't do much else other that to look upwards, and take in the details of this newcomer's face.

To you, it was just another animal chick, but to Ankha it was none other than her good friend...
111133.title: Snooties Assemble

choices: "We better go with your idea" (Foot Worship)
"I can handle it. Let's go with my idea" (Foot Sandwich)
1111331.content:
"Oh, dear me. I hope I didn't interrupt you two with anything."

Those were the first words you've heard of Ankha's mysterious guests, and although they carried a well-meaning, and even concerned intent, the tone of her voice spelled nothing of the sort.

With your mind cleared after the initial shock, you were now able to take a good look at this new giantess, who appeared to take the form of a white deer.
From heavens up high she started you down, her eyes black, and cold, the lady looking rather unimpressed with your form. Most of her body was covered in short, white fur, with notable exceptions being the palms of her hands, and you assumed the soles of her feet as well. Those showed some of her skin, somewhat reddish, and noticeably moist.
Aside from her head being that of a deer, her body seemed to resemble that of a human almost one to one, down to her hands and feet having five digits each. Said digits, however, seemed to be entirely coated in pink keratin, though you couldn't tell if it was their natural color, or some kinda nail polish
Looking down at her feet, you confirmed the same applied to them: mostly coated in white fur, with bared, reddish soles, and pink, pointy, sturdy-looking toes. You'd imagine the biggest one could easily fit most of your body underneath it...

The deer woman let out a a devilish giggle, bringing your attention away from her feet, and back to her face. Her expression only got snootier, as she relished in the attention you paid to her toes.

"Ahaha, I see you don't waste your time with them, dear Ankha. Five to ten minutes, and he already seems to know its place. Just look at the little creep, and how he's ogling my feet. Want a closer look, hun~?"

With that the giantess began to move one of her feet closer towards you, toes wiggling in a teasing manner, as if waving for you to come closer. To you, of course, this seemed more like a scene from some bizarre monster movie, with the giant foot acting as the predator closing in on its prey. Still sat on your ass, you began to desperately drag yourself away from the approaching mass, not at all interested in the undoubtedly nightmarish scenarios she had in store for you.

You didn't get too far away from her, however, before your back rammed against another furry mass: a crevice in-between two of Ankha's giant toes. You were so focused on one giantess, you completely forgot about the other, and now you were going to pay for it.

Before even a single squeak escaped your lips, Ankha clenched her toes tightly upon you, entombing you between her golden digits. With your face forced against their moist flesh, you could hardly keep her foot sweat from getting into your mouth, unwillingly downing what felt like gallons of it. With your mouth heavily occupied, you had no choice but take deep sniffs with your nose, taking in an uncanny amount of her toes' funky, foul smell. Here, nothing could be heard outside of your own pained groans, and what you assumed was your own body creaking in response to the pressure, that the giant catgirl was so casually exerting upon you.

For you, this was hell on earth.

For Ankha, it was a source of a tingly, pleasant sensation.

"Ooh, I'm afraid he was more into my toes, my deer Diana~" Ankha smugly stated, barely able to stifle a giggle as she did so. This didn't seem to bother Diana at all, however.

"Aww, poor Ankha. Is that your only way to get those bugs near your feet? Catch them when they're not looking?" The deer lady had this retort ready the second she saw you disappear between her friend's plump digits "I'd never know how that must feel. My worms, you see, basically throw themselves at my soles to please me~"

"Huh, you sure that's the reason?" Ankha wasn't too far behind, easily able to come up with some witty rebuttals on the spot "You sure they're not doing so just to get themselves crushed? Can't stand your feet so much, they'd rather go squish, than spend another second near them~"

"Gah, you've got a lot of nerve to imply those specks can't stand my feet, when it's clear this one is trying his hardest to get away from yours" Diana answered, now somewhat annoyed with this conversation, her eyes now locked on her friend's toes. A single, tiny arm somehow managed to make it out of their tight hold, and was now furiously beating at them.

"Hmm, so he is" Ankha muttered, now too looking down at her toes. She toyed with the idea of snapping your arm like a twig, or even tearing it right off, but she had plans for you that required you being in one piece... At least for the time being.

Although she did so regrettably, Ankha eased her hold on you, before fully dragging her foot back. Finally you were left alone, looking now like a miserable shade of a man, half bawling your eyes out, half gasping for air. Meanwhile, the two giantess took a stand in front of you, one pair of giant feet to the left, and one to the right.
Things were now back to square one. The only door was once again behind you, but you'd be damned to try and escape through it again. I mean, what if there was another giantess hiding somewhere out there, waiting to put her foot in your path? You'd probably go insane, if something like that were to happen.

Their toes wiggling in unison, the cruel giantesses stared at your pathetic self, while thinking of ways to torment you together. An opportunity to share a micro like that didn't come often, and so they wanted to make sure they'd make the most of it.

Diana was the first one to speak her piece "I always love leaving my bugs to worship my feet, while I hardly acknowledge their effort. Helps drive the point across, of just how little they matter in the grand scheme of things"

You didn't like the sound of it in the slightest, and even less where she was going with it. "How about we do so with this one? Let him tend to our feet, while we continue our team party?"

Nope, didn't like it at all. Fortunately(?), Ankha seemed to agree.

"I dunno. Unless we switch our feet often, it wouldn't be much of a joined effort on our part. Wouldn't feel like we were doing it together."

For a moment they stayed silent, until one of them spoke again. This time it was Ankha.

"How about we continue the tea party, but with him sandwiched between our soles? Now that's what I'd call teamwork. Wouldn't you agree?"

You wouldn't agree for sure, but your opinion didn't matter at all. Surprisingly though, Diana didn't seem too keen on the idea either.

"Eh, perhaps under different circumstances I'd enjoy it a lot, but today my poor soles are in a particularly bad shape" As she said it, the deer woman rose one of her feet up, giving her friend a good at it. From toes to heel, the whole expanse of vermilion sole seemed coated in a fine layer of some dense, filthy-looking fluid. It didn't take a brainiac to figure out that her must've had some problem with profound sweating. Ankha didn't seem too happy with their look either, looking solemnly over Diana's foot.

"Now, I obviously wouldn't mind drowning that speck in my foot sweat, but I'd never subject your own feet to that horror as well. Unless you think you'd be fine with... that, then I'm afraid your idea's a no go."

Ankha looked away from her friend's feet to shoot you a death glare, then tuned back to Diana's sole. Then back at you, then back at her foot again. Her sole, then you. Sole, you, sole, you, over and over and over again, until the catgirl finally came to a decisive conclusion.

"I think..."
1111331.title: Ankha's Deer Friend

As I walked I came across a simple pipe shaped house surrounded by blue roses and stunning peach trees and that house belonged to a female rabbit named Gabi.

1131.content:
As you get closer to her bed you notice her brown coloured shoes sticking out of the covers as you get closer and closer to the bed where she has been sleeping after a long day of catching bugs and fish.

You also start to notice how worn out her shoes really are and if you look closely enough through the holes you can see her pure white socks.

Luckily you have a pair of scissors in your pockets and slowly but carefully not to wake her up you start at the sole of the shoe with the scissors and eventually the toes of the shoes.

The soles of the shoes fall off on the floor revealing her socked feet.

The socks are very clean almost like they were washed today and by now you start to take off her socks by the ankle.

As soon as both of the socks have been taken off you gaze in awe at the furry and soft yet adorable rabbit feet of Gabi because how cute they really are and that they rarely see the light of day.


You start touching her bare exposed sole by the pinky finger and you get goosebumps from how soft they really are.

122.content:
New home means new clothes. You look around town until you finally find the local tailor shop. You enter and are greeted by two things, a ringing bell and an excitable blue hedgehog girl.

"Hello, and welcome to Able Sisters tailor shop. My name is Mable, nice to meet you. I don't recognize you. Are you new to town or something?"

"I just moved in today actually." You look her over. She's wearing a green plaid apron and it seemed to be little else. Whether she was truly naked under it or her clothes simply matched her fur was a question you didn't feel like asking right now. Your eyes get stuck on her bare feet... or paws. You'll need to ask about that later. They looked perfect, nice and soft looking with padded soles and a small claw-like nail at the end of each toe. She's bounced on the balls of her feet in excitement for meeting you. Your eyes shoot back up to her when she starts to speak again.

"That's great. It's always fun to meet new people. Take a look around. Tell me if you see anything you like." She says that last part with a seductive purr and a wiggling of her toes.

"Thank you. I will." You start to look around the shop before your eyes are drawn to another hedgehog girl in the back corner of the shop on a sewing machine. She had brown fur and a similar apron to Mable, only her's was pink. When she notices you looking at her, she blushes and turns back to the machine. But you can see her slightly slide her feet out from under her desk with a wiggle. You turn back to Mable. "Who's she?"

"Oh her? That's my sister Sable. Don't mind her, she doesn't talk much with the customers and she's a bit shy. Don't worry though, I'm right here if you need anything."

What do you do?
122.title: Able Sisters

1221.content:
Looking for some new clothes like shirts pants I asked Sable where to find the beautiful shirt I had seen in a advertisement on the local news paper Forest daily.

She replied back with "Hello there young man how can I possibly help you out today"

I replied back with "I just moved into this town and I have been looking for some new clothing especially a shirt I saw in the local newspaper.

"Very well come with me and I will assist you in finding anything that you might be looking for" she said.

It was only now that you noticed her brown loafers and socked feet unlike her sister who was barefoot all time.

I followed her and eventually Eureka there it was the black k.k. slider fanshirt.

Although you had found the shirt you
were not finished just yet and because you gained some naughty thoughts.

Eventually I found the rest of clothes I was looking for including a pair of dark blue jeans.

She sat down at her desk reading her X men comics exhausted from the amount of work she had to endure each day of the week.

"What's the matter Sable?" I asked

"Oh it's nothing I am just really tired and to be fair I would not mind if you can help me out a bit".

"There is a room just nearby so come with me and I will help you relax because you deserve it" I said

you were now inside the bedroom of this building and inside was a device used for tickling.

Your heart started to beat faster as you anticipated this event with great pride.
1221.title: Tickle Sable's feet

12211.content:
As I entered the room I put her feet into the stocks getting her ready for some tickling which was something she had experienced as a young girl wher sisters used to tickle her just for the fun of it.

"Are you ready for this?" I asked

"I have been looking forward to experiencing this again and I am more than ready" she said with a smile.

Grabbing a toothbrush from my pocket I lifted her shirt up and started to brush her furry belly and she was trying really hard not to laugh.

I then went for her feet and grabbed both her shoes and pulled them off exposing her black nylon socks.

Usually she never took her shoes and socks off except for bed and even then she was shy about showing them.

Using my index finger I scribbled at her socked feet causing her to giggle slightly at the ticklish sensation.

"hihi that tickles" she said as I kept on tickling her.

Sticking my thumb in her left sock I started to tug at it until it eventually came off revealing her soft and vulnerable feetpaws that rarely saw the light of the day.

I then pulled her right sock off as well and she started to wiggle her toes at the sight of her now bare paws and she realised just how cute they really were.

Taking the toothbrush I brushed against her left heel and she let out the cutest laughter.


I then started to lick between her soft toes and by that point she was howling with laughter "Please god make it stop I can't take it anymore".

And eventually I let her go but on the condition that she would go barefooted for a day before she would get her footwear back.

The next day in the store her sister Mabel noticed her missing footwear and she asked

"Sable where are your shoes and socks did you lose them?"

"Yeah I must have lost them but I will get them back" she lied to her

The following day though she got them back but she decided that not wearing them actually felt better.

End of story

1223.content:
"Say, Mable, was it?" you ask. She nods in response. "I just moved in to this nice new house today. I was wondering if maybe you and your sister would like to come by and see it?" you offer.

"Ooooo, that sounds like fun. But, I don't think Sable will be too into it. She's not really the social type you know. I'd gladly come to your house with you if you want to. Just you, me, bonding." She says that last part with a bat of her eyelashes.

"Now hold on, it would be rude to assume she wouldn't want to go without asking first. I'll go see what she thinks." You walk to the back of the shop, up to her desk and tap a finger on the top to get the brown hedgehog's attention. She looks up to see you and starts to blush again. "You're Sable, right."

"Mmhmm."

"Hi there. I just moved into this village today and I was wondering if you and your sister would like to come over to my home for a little housewarming. What do you say?" She looks away.

"Well if you really want me to." She mutters.

"Was that a yes?" She nods. "Great. Then I guess I'll see you two ladies tonight." You say as you turn to make your leave.

What happens next?
1223.title: Try and spend time with both

choices: You offer her a foot massage
12232.content:
You exit the Able Sisters' store and begin to head home. You couldn't wait to have them over. You begin to ponder whether or not they somehow knew about your foot fetish with how much they were waving their feet around,when it hit you. You still hadn't registered yourself as a citizen here yet. Not wanting to get in trouble with the law, you check your map and find your way to city hall.

You enter town hall with a creak of the door. "Hello?" You announce. "Is anyone here?" You enter the rest of the way and see a cute dog girl sitting at the desk, typing away at her computer.

"Oh... Hello there. Welcome to town hall. How may I help you?" She asks with a chipper attitude that made you want to pinch her cheeks.

"Well, I've just moved here today. I was looking to get myself registered as a citizen of this town. Can you help me with that?"

"Of course. Welcome to our town. I'm Isabelle. It's a pleasure to meet you." She begins looking through all sorts of various drawers. Meanwhile, you take a chance to sneak a peak at her feet. Furry and padded, just like the sisters', yet hers seemed... different. Maybe she used something special on her feet but they seemed almost perfect. She wheels back to you with a sheet of paper in hand.

"Here you go. Just sign here and you're done." You sign where she instructed and she takes it. "Welcome to the town." She files away the paper then props her soft feet up on the desk, wiggling her toes. "Oh, if hope you don't mind. They've just been so sore after working for so long."

"No no, I don't mind."

What happens next?
12232.title: Go to town hall and register yourself

You can't help yourself and give her pad a kiss
122321.content:
"If your feet are feeling sore, how are I give you a nice foot massage?" You offer, trying your best to hide your excitement.

"That sounds perfect honestly. I hope you don't mind, they aren't exactly clean." She covers her mouth with her fist and starts to blush.

"It's fine, I can handle a little dirt and sweat if it means a cute girl like you can relax a little." Her face reddens even deeper.

"You think I'm c-c-cute?" She stutters out.

"Who wouldn't? You're adorable. I've had to fight the urge to scratch behind your ears since I came in." You hope you lightened the mood and didn't make things weird.

"That's sweet of you to say. Okay then, I'll take you up on that massage." She pushes her feet across the desk towards you. You take her right foot into your hands and start rubbing. "Oooooooooooooooo. That feels amaaaaazing." She moans out.

"So while I have you here, I have to know, do you guys actually call these feet, or are they paws?"

"Either works. We used to call them paws before we met humans. Now 'feet' are the universal term." She explains as she closes her eyes and leans back in pleasure.

What happens next?

"Mmmmmm. You're a pro at this, you know that. I know a lot of ladies in town that would pay bells like nothing else to get treatment like this." You blush at her compliment.

"Thanks. I've never really done this before though. I'm mostly just doing what seems right."

"Well it's completely right. I think we found you a job here in town, professional foot masseuse." You shift over to her left foot and continue talking.

"You think so? You don't think people will think I'm weird?"

"Of course not. Everyone builds up stress on their feet. I doubt they would really question someone skilled like you. Oooooo, right there." She moans with a blush forming.

"Say Isabelle, later tonight I'm having a bit of a housewarming party at my house with the Able Sisters. I was thinking, maybe you'd like to come?" You give her your own puppy eyes.

"If you keep it up with massages like this and I'll come over to your house whenever you call. I'd love to come." You finish up her other foot and set them both down on the desk.

"Great. I'll see you tonight then." With a wave goodbye, you exit town hall and continue about your day.

What next?

12232112.content:
You figure that you might as well send a letter out to your mom to tell her ypu made it here safe and sound. You quickly pull out a piece of stationary and begin to write. You tell her that you're safe and have already started making new friends. That should be enough to calm her nerves. Now you just need to send it. Back to your trusty map to find the post office.

*****

You enter the post office and see a white pelican girl sitting at her desk, humming a tune to herself. "Oh, hello there. You must be the new resident. I'm Pelly the postal worker. How may I help you?"

"I'm looking to send a letter. Can you help me?" You pull out your stationary and hand it to her.

"Of course. I'll just stuff this away in my mail bag and it'll be sent off tomorrow." She grabs your letter and stuffs it away behind the counter. "There. All taken care of. By the way..." she motions for you to come closer. You lean in and she whispers in your ear. "I know about your little secret. I know you have a foot fetish." Your face starts to go pale. "Don't worry, I don't mind. In fact, how about you come back here and give my webbed feet a try?"

choices: They reveal that they know about your fetish and want to have fun with it.
They keep quiet for now and tease you constantly
They gang up on you and tie you up.
122321122.content:

Sure you put up some resistance in the beginning and did make the occasional pleas to restore you or let you go, but honestly it didn’t even take 3 days for you to start submitting yourself to his feet with almost no hassle. You treated him like a god. And in a sense he pretty much was one to you. One who would protect you and provide for you in exchange for proper worshiping.

Many people wondered whatever happened to the new human villager who vanished as quickly as they moved into town. Some were still curious, but by this point many had stopped worrying or had simply forgotten about the human they saw maybe once or twice. Only kicks really knew the human’s fate. He would savor the feeling of you underneath him for years to come while others would never know the truth behind his even more cheerful mood. You were destined to serve and amuse the giant skunk and his sweaty and dirty soles for the rest of your natural life. Not that you minded it too much.

14.content:
You are approaching the town hall. This is not the biggest one you've ever seen but it is a decent building. The kind of place filled with peace and silence.

You open the humble door and get inside. The room is medium, wooden but very clean, the furniture are not the newest but it's decent, the light is perfect, the inside is colorful. It was an old and classic town hall as you can see in any village, an important place with a few people coming in and out that always looks comfortable and welcoming. But inside this building, there is someone more important than anything else, a fast and efficient person, "a girl whose the heart is full of kindness" according to what you've heard from people in the train.

You are in a first time impressed to see that such a girl is in fact, a dog-girl. After a few seconds, you wondered that should not change anything, since such village is an official village, these people should be not different compared to the rest of the world.

You come closer to the person, a wooden desk with a lot of paper sheets is separating you, the girl seems to be always busy, working hard on administrative documents like she will never stop. Behind her, you can notice huge bookcases and another desk equipped with a computer, certainly the lone computer of the town hall. Wanting to finish all the tasks concerning your presence in this village, you ask with a little shyness :
"-E..excuse me? Is... is it the place to get registered as a new inhabitant? I just unpacked today in my new home..."

At the moment you started talking, the girl immediately stopped working, looking at you with a smile, listening to you.
"-Ho, you are the newcomer? Very well! My name's Isabelle, secretary in our beautiful town, pleased to meet you! Well, to be registered as new resident, you should fill..."

Isabelle, since it is her name, was searching the document among the files. She was trying to be fast, but you can see she was about to do wrong because of this, and you were right. At the moment she put the sheet in front of you and try to give you a pen to fill it, she slips and "whoops", the pen fall on the floor.

The things were so quick that you barely understood what happened. The pen was very close to the desk and at the moment you crouch to grab it, you can see a dog foot coming from the gap between the desk and the floor, trying to get it at the same time, grabbing your finger with her toes instead of the pen. The paw is warm and you can feel some particles covering it, and it pulls you a bit for one second before Isabelle realizes she wasn't taking a pen and releases you.

"Ho...ho... I'm so sorry! I never wanted to..."
"-No, it's okay!"

You answer, still a bit surprised while you're standing up with the pencil in your hand, starting to fill the document. While you're writing, you are wondering about what just happened... you don't know her but you touched her foot, and you know deep inside how this part of the body interest you despite the fact you never tell to anyone or at least, tried to hide it.

Once you are done, the secretary takes the sheet and moves to the computer, typing something. In the meantime, the temptation growing inside your mind, you could not resist to smell your finger she grabbed, trying to figure her odor. The scent wasn't very smelly because the contact was short, but you can imagine how sweaty and salty her soles should be for the few you got. You would have enjoyed smelling your finger several time to carry on your analysis but you got interrupted by Isabelle who looked at you.

"-Is everything okay? I hope I didn't scratched you with my claws?"
"-Hum. No. No! I was just... err... wondering. How... how to get a job in here? I would like to help people, after all... I want to be part of the community!"

Answering was hard in such situation but you think you did a nice answer to prevent any problem.

"-A job? Hmmm... I guess, I can look for this while it's loading..."
The girl stands up and moves beck to her previous spot, closer to you, and starts browsing several books laying on her desk. But this time, she has a new posture, a posture more... interesting to you... She is facing to the left, reading, her right foot is resting on her left knee, showing you her sole. Furry, padded and covered with sweat... the foot itself wasn't dirty since the floor is clean but you can imagine that working for an entire day in such a place should be hot and exhausting. This simple sole caught your eyes for a few seconds, but you suddenly come back to reality when you thought she was looking at you with a quiet eye but when you can see that she's still reading. Was it you imagination?

Anyway, she finally gathers a few booklets about several available jobs in the town and give it to you with a great smile. You take it after a thank. She moves back to her computer. Typing again a couple of words before coming back to you. Thinking about it, you dare to ask.

"-Well, it sounds you're typing a lot of thing! Is it part of the registration?"
"-Yes it is! I'm adding more information, including the fact you are looking for some work to do. And now, it will be loading again..."

The dog approaches for the second time, sitting on her soft office chair.

"I must say, it will be better if you can define an accurate job, or maybe you're ready to accept any kind of task to fulfill?"
"-Well, I don't know... I just moved to this town... Guess, I'll just... need some... time..."

At the moment you are talking, Isabelle spreads her legs on her desk, disturbing you a lot... Her both soles are a few inches away from your face, so close that you can smell her odor from your position, seeing with accuracy the state of her paws. A few dirt mixed with dust, covered with sweat, hiding some damaged skin.

You remain silent for a time, even longer than before... you are marveling at her feet, your eyes are staring at each spot. These feet looks tired and are smelly but they are also cute. However, you just realized you were actually talking and interrupted yourself suddenly because of those feet... taken with panic, you suddenly raise your head, looking at the secretary. You moved so suddenly that Isabelle didn't even saw it coming, revealing you for a few seconds, the face of a girl who was looking at you with a grin...
It quickly changes to a surprised face and Isabelle moves her legs from the desk.

"-I... I... er... I guess the computer has loaded the data! Let me check!"

And she left once again... but at least this time, you know you didn't invented it... she saw you watching her feet and she seems to enjoy it. You are now even wondering : is she teasing you during all this time? For sure, she knows about your little secret now... where could it lead you? And why is she still typing every time she leaves you?

You try to lean a bit in order to see her face hidden behind the screen and you can see something even more suspicious... she's smiling... like if she was addressing a message or a mail to someone... and is having fun about it... Giving you a bad feeling about it.
After a few minutes, she finally finishes and comes to you, yawning and stretching.

"Phew ! Finaly done! These machines are so hard to use... and I never been good with computer... But now, everything is done, I can finaly take a break!"
"-You had a bad day, don't you?"
"-I won't say bad, but tiring as usual...and my feet aches..."

The magic word came out of her mouth, confusing you a bit.
"-R..really? I mean...how..."
"-Look" she says showing you her soles again. "The skin is completely cracked... It's very painful... if only someone could give me some... care..."

Isabelle gives you a look that makes a real chill on your back... Such a fair opportunity was something hard to resist... but is it wise to start playing with the feet of someone you just met? Of course, a simple massage would be something harmless and innocent...but who knows the consequence of such an action?

This awkward moment was a long humiliation and the fear that someone will come into the town hall was haunting you.

Once she decides it was enough, she asks you to stop and put her feet down on the ground.

"You are doing well, you'll be a very good assisant but now, it's time put you in a real situation while I'll be retyping the mail. Approach the computer desk, now!"

You do what she asks with still this little shyness. This foot game has been very exciting to you despite the fact it has been long... but you remember how many hours you are going to spend doing this job...

"Lie down under the desk..." You looks at her a bit astonished but decide to complete the task anyway...Once you are in position, she moves a chair, sit down and you, her both feet are resting on your face. You can feel the hot soles on you, rubbing your cheeks and lips, pushing your mouth sometimes to force you to kiss them. This time got long, too long for simply editing an email...but you had to worship these feet, sniffing and kissing them. Then suddenly, one of them got on of it toes in your mouth, going up and down to ask you to suck it.. then another one, and another one... But at the moment you are the most excited, she stops. It was certainly something she did volunteerly to frustrate you so she could keep the pleasure for herself.

She moves her chair back and congratulates you.

"End of the day! Good job assistant! It was your first evening and you did well! You can stand up now."

You stands up. She looks at you with a smile, feeling very satisfied. Hopefuly you could keep such efficiency everyday but as a job related to your fetish, you are getting more confident about it... maybe asking for more...

At the moment your sights crossed each other, she says:
"It's getting late! Time for me to go back home..."
143.title: The contract

choices: Isabelle comes to let you start your first day of work
You woke up in a different place
Some trespasser comes at night and finds you
1432.content:
She looks at you with a smile, but it was not one of those that let you think she appreciates your person but one of those you can find when someone got plans in mind...as she's finishing her sentence :

"...but since you didn't spent a whole day with me in this office as mentionned in the contract you've just signed, you'll have... a specific night session alone... but just for tonight... ...Follow me!" She says after several short pauses in her sentences.
The girl then takes your hand and opens the door at the end of the office where no one goes except people working in the town hall.
"-Hey, what do you mean? And where are you leading me?"

You ask while following her. As she showed herself very playful a few minutes ago, the fact she got an idea just for you gave you a real bad feeling about what is going to happen... she enjoyed teasing and playing with her paws on you, what is she going to do with you if she's going to leave.

So she finaly reaches a door and opens it, inviting you to go in first.

"-Here we are, please go in."

At the moment you enter the room, some strong smell striked your nostrils and once she turns on the light, everything was more clear : the place is a storage room with several shelves filled with old shoes and socks and a couple of chairs between them.

Surprised and confused, you naturaly ask about the purpose of the room. The dog-woman giggles
"This is obviously our shoes and socks storage! People in town don't use to wear them such like you, prefering walking barefoot but for winter when it's too cold or sportive events, having such clothing is always useful... so since people don't need them everyday in their life and don't feel the need to store them at home, we have decided to store them in the town hall so they could borrow some pairs of socks and shoes if they need it just by asking and signing a list and a delay to return it...thus it happens nigh everytime that they don't have the time to wash them... and give them back dirty, sweaty and of course smelly... And it's not my job to wash them so... it's getting worse every years."

During her long monolog, you're wandering, looking around the storage room and the look of the shoes and socks... there were many colors despite the fact most of them turned yellow, brown or even black because of the dust, dirt and sweat gathered after all that time... Once it's finaly your time to speak, you lean on one of the shelves and say :
"-So I guess... you want me to clean them all? Where is the washing machine?"

At the moment you asked your question, a large grin appeared on Isabelle's lips.

"What did I said wrong?"
"-You guessed right about the task but I fear there is no washing machine in here..."

Isabelle come closer to you, grabbing secretly something from her purse... before suddenly using it on you.

"-I fear you'll be the machine... and your first night session will start now!"

She attached one of your hands to one bar of the shelf with cuffs. And soon will do the same with your other hand.

"Calm down, everything's gonna be right... just sit down and say 'Haa', let me do... and you'll be fine until tomorrow morning... Let's see..."

"-Isabelle, please!"

"-I use to love wearing these pink ones... the green one too! The white one there is very very grimy.. but let's see how he's gonna be efficient..."

You plead, tried to notify her that you were not fond of the plan despite your fetish... but she didn't listened a word of what you said and comes to you with about seven pairs of socks in her hands that she holds like if it was a bouquet of socks instead of flowers, pushing it against your face.

"Tell me what you think about it? Foul isn't it? Be very cautious with it, I enjoy wearing them when I've got the opportunity to wear them..."

And she starts pushing them into your mouth as much as she can... at the end, only one very smelly pair of light blue and black socks could not enter... but it wasn't enough to stop the excited dog.
She takes some duct tape and stickes on your mouth so they could help on preventing you from spitting the present she gave you while sniffing them.

Then she steps back to see the result of her work and if you were in the best position to execute your duty. In your case, you are now unable to move or say a word, just having the taste of the salty sweat-covered fabric of the socks while the foul scent was still invading your nose... You thought she was done and you'll be at peace for the night despite this humliating and awkward position but you have forgotten the rule about such situation : it always can be worst.

The girl takes a shoes and approaches to your position.
"These shoes are my favorite ones... I wear them every winter and every sportive activities in summer... I want you to tell you all these days... but with the smell made from the effort..."

Then she put her shoe against your face, tied up the shoelace around your head, and reinforced it position with more duct tape.

The Isabelle's smell was already a thing when she pressed her pads against your face after a day of work, but now, it was about sweat gathered after monthes and certainly years of wearing despite being unused for the rest of the time... offering you a very strong cheesy scent that could have made you coughing. In the meantime, the dog-girl was leaving the room.

"Have a good night newcomer. I'm pleased to have been helpful to you and hope you're gonna spend a nice first night in your new home, haha... See you tomorrow!"

She turns the light off and left, closing the door behind and locking it.
Now blind in darkness and unable to move in a very silent room, all your senses are now focus on you lonely working ones : your sense of smell and taste.

The wet socks savor never left you once time for the night, while the rancid odor didn't calmed down after that much breathing.
You tried to get used to it and sleep. It was an hard thing to do, but it was certainly the best thing to do in order to make this game softer. You didn't know how many time you had to struggle to finaly sleep but for sure you suffered from this funny situation for hours.

Until you wake up...
1432.title: Socks keeper...

info.brief_description: ~Up to 8,000GP per add!~ Animal Crossing villagers want you to play with their feet!
info.description:
Welcome to Anytown!
You've just moved into a town full of animals, and they're all eager to greet you... in a rather peculiar way: with their feet!

REWARDS
To get this story going, I'm offering up to 8,000 GP for every full, well-written chapter! This reward will likely be lowered in the future, so get writing!

RULES
1.) This story should focus around the main character playing with the feet of the various characters in Animal Crossing. The way this happens could be as something as innocent as a villager asking the MC for a foot massage, to a sadistic villager kidnapping and making the MC worship their feet against their will.
2). The main character's gender is ambiguous by default, but if you wish to create chapters that imply a specific gender (eg. being male to receive a footjob), you can do so as long as you label the chapter appropriately. Send me a message if you need an option changed.
3.) Any and all official Animal Crossing villagers and NPCs are allowed! No fan characters, sorry.
4.) Macro/micro is okay in moderation. This is not a shrinking story, and if the main character is shrunk, it should only be for footplay purposes.
5.) The main character has a foot fetish. Whether a villager knows that or not is up to you to decide.
6.) Dirty feet, socks, shoes, etc. are a-okay! (It's not like many of the villagers wear shoes, anyway!)
7.) No deaths; no story-ending chapters.
8.) When adding new characters to the story, please add them to the appropriate main section (town villagers/regular NPCs/special NPCs)! If you're not sure where a specific character would belong, check each section to see example of characters for that section, or send me a message.

If you have any questions, are not sure where to place a chapter, or need to edit something, please send me a message and I'll be happy to help you!

Have fun!
